ICO 2024
Relive the highlights of ICO 2024!
From groundbreaking sessions to inspiring speeches, relive the excitement and key takeaways that made this year’s congress unforgettable. Watch our highlights video on our YouTube channel
WATCH NOW
















DATA
Global Obesity Observatory
At the World Obesity Federation we have been collating data for over 20 years. This database is online and available to view in various formats.
VIEW OUR DATA

Our Members
Our members are organisations representing healthcare professionals, researchers, policy specialists and those with lived experience of obesity.

Our Image Bank forms a gallery of free-to-use images to ensure accurate, non-biased, respectful images are widely available.

Recent News
View all












News Apr 01, 25
World Obesity Day 2025: Changing systems for healthier lives
For WOD 2025, we were joined by participants all around the world in a joint call for transformation of our systems.
Read Post














News Apr 01, 25
South Africa leading G20 Nations with obesity and NCDs health agenda
The second G20 Health Working Group (HWG) meeting brought together delegates to discuss critical health challenges.
Read Post














News Mar 03, 25
World Obesity Atlas 2025: Majority of countries unprepared for rising obesity level
We've released our 2025 World Obesity Atlas, presenting new data on overweight and obesity prevalence around the world.
Read Post















Resources
World Obesity Resources
We have a wide range of resources available for you to download, read, use or purchase.

Policy Dossiers - These provide evidence and resources to help policymakers, NGOs and others.
Journals - World Obesity publishes four scientific, peer-reviewed journals.
Image Bank - A gallery of free-to-use images to ensure accurate, non-biased, and respectful images are widely available.
Resource Library - We produce a range of statements, responses, papers and reports related to obesity.
Obesity: The Other Pandemic of the 21st Century - This work features contributions from leading experts in the field of obesity management and prevention.

RESOURCES







































Data








Training & Events








Resources








Our Network























Membership
Our Members
World Obesity Federation is a membership organisation representing national and regional associations dedicated to the study and management of obesity and related comorbidities.
Our membership body currently comprises more than 80 associations in over 100 countries and territories.
Our members are organisations representing healthcare professionals, researchers, policy specialists and those with lived experience of obesity. As well as a membership programme for non-profit organisations, World Obesity runs a Champions programme for partners.
Find out more













Upcoming Events
View all












Member May 11, 25


European Congress on Obesity (ECO) 2025

ECO 2025, will be held 11-14 May - taking place in Malaga, Spain.
Read Post














UN Event May 19, 25


78th World Health Assembly

The World Health Organization's 78th World Health Assembly will take place 19 – 27 May 2025.
Read Post














May 20, 25


Driving Action on Obesity and NCDs

We are hosting a breakfast event on the side-lines of the 78th World Health Assembly on Tuesday 20 May 2025 in Geneva.
Read Post

Resources
World Obesity Resources
We have a wide range of resources available for you to download, read, use or purchase.

Policy Dossiers - These provide evidence and resources to help policymakers, NGOs and others.
Journals - World Obesity publishes four scientific, peer-reviewed journals.
Image Bank - A gallery of free-to-use images to ensure accurate, non-biased, and respectful images are widely available.
Resource Library - We produce a range of statements, responses, papers and reports related to obesity.
Obesity: The Other Pandemic of the 21st Century - This work features contributions from leading experts in the field of obesity management and prevention.

Our Network

Our Network

Membership
Our Members
World Obesity Federation is a membership organisation representing national and regional associations dedicated to the study and management of obesity and related comorbidities.
Our membership body currently comprises more than 80 associations in over 100 countries and territories.
Our members are organisations representing healthcare professionals, researchers, policy specialists and those with lived experience of obesity. As well as a membership programme for non-profit organisations, World Obesity runs a Champions programme for partners.
Find out more

metadata.description: The World Obesity Federation drive global efforts to reduce, prevent and treat obesity.

summary:
SCOPE
Strategic Centre for Obesity Professional Education







Global Obesity Observatory
World Obesity data from around the world







ICO 2024
International Congress on Obesity 2024







World Obesity Day
4th March


















ICO 2024
Relive the highlights of ICO 2024! Watch our highlights video on our YouTube channel
WATCH NOW
















DATA
Global Obesity Observatory
At the World Obesity Federation we have been collating data for over 20 years. VIEW OUR IMAGE BANK











Recent News
View all












News Apr 01, 25
World Obesity Day 2025: Changing systems for healthier lives
For WOD 2025, we were joined by participants all around the world in a joint call for transformation of our systems. Read Post














News Mar 03, 25
World Obesity Atlas 2025: Majority of countries unprepared for rising obesity level
We've released our 2025 World Obesity Atlas, presenting new data on overweight and obesity prevalence around the world. RESOURCES







































Data








Training & Events








Resources








Our Network























Membership
Our Members
World Obesity Federation is a membership organisation representing national and regional associations dedicated to the study and management of obesity and related comorbidities. Read Post














UN Event May 19, 25


78th World Health Assembly

The World Health Organization's 78th World Health Assembly will take place 19 – 27 May 2025. Read Post














May 20, 25


Driving Action on Obesity and NCDs

We are hosting a breakfast event on the side-lines of the 78th World Health Assembly on Tuesday 20 May 2025 in Geneva. Read Post
